post.image_prompt: The image showcases a close-up of a model with beautifully enhanced lips using the new Huda Beauty Lip Contour Stain and Faux Filler Jelly Oil. The background is a soft, diffused beige, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. The lighting is soft and diffused, highlighting the natural texture and radiance of the lips. The focus is sharp on the lips, with a slight blur in the background to draw attention to the product. The model's expression is serene and confident, reflecting the empowering nature of the brand. The composition is balanced and aesthetically pleasing, with the lips centered in the frame. The color palette is warm and inviting, with shades of nude, brown, and peach dominating the scene. The image aims to convey a sense of natural beauty and effortless glamour, aligning with the brand's commitment to inclusivity and authenticity.
